author: Gordon Lubold
title: In Surprise Visit to Kabul, Jim Mattis Stresses Focus on Peace, Reconciliation
text:
KABUL—U.S. Defense Secretary Jim Mattis arrived in Afghanistan’s capital on an unannounced visit as coalition forces, bolstered by more than 3,500 additional American forces, prepare for spring fighting season against the Taliban and Islamic State fighters.

But Mr. Mattis, a former Marine general on his third visit to Afghanistan as secretary, said he was just as focused on peace and reconciliation. Afghan President Ashraf Ghani’s government recently invited the Taliban—the country’s largest insurgency—to discuss a political...
